decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (BROOK/01, BROOK/02, BROOK/03 Received: 04 September 2013 Unnumbered Site Location Plan Received: 27 September 2013 Noise Impact Assessment Received: 23 December 2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The hours of operation of the dance studio at 6 Brook Lane Business Centre shall be limited to 5pm to 9pm Monday to Friday, unless prior approval has been sought from the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 4 - The rear external doors shall be kept close at all times that amplified music is being played inside the building.
Condition : 5 - No additional glazed openings shall be inserted into the rear elevation of the building.

Condition : 6 - The rating level of noise emitted from the site, shall be lower than the existing background noise level by 10dB. The noise levels shall be determined at the nearest noise sensitive locations. The levels shall be determined according to BS4142:1997.

Condition : 7 - The use hereby permitted shall be carried out only by the Alliance Dance Unit. When the premises cease to be occupied by the Alliance Dance Unit, then the use hereby permitted shall cease and the building reverted back to its former use as B1.
description: Change of use of an industrial unit from a photographic studio to a dance studio.
